text: Jaybee Niño Manicad Sebastian (1979/1980 – July 18, 2020) was a Filipino criminal. He was at the New Bilibid Prison (NBP). He was convicted for kidnap- for-ransom and carjacking in 2009. He was known for running a prison and being involved in the illegal drug trade within the prison. Sebastian died of COVID-19 at the New Bilibid Prison Hospital on July 18, 2020, aged 40. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:1980 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the Philippines Category:Filipino criminals
title: Jaybee Sebastian
